Seasonal Persistence Forecasting With Python
data.description: It is common to use persistence or naive forecasts as a first-cut forecast on time series problems. A better first-cut forecast on time series data with a seasonal component is to persist the observation for the same time in the previous season. This is called seasonal persistence. In this tutorial, you will discover how to […]
